rationale: Directional conflict ratio remains 1.0 with symmetric support/weakening evidence; run adjudication experiments and literature triangulation before promotion.
selected_option: Keep candidate and run conflict-resolution experiments (most balanced)

rationale: Directional conflict ratio remains 1.0 with balanced support/weakening evidence; resolve with adjudication runs and targeted literature before narrowing the question.

rationale: Accepted demotion after additional runs kept directional conflict at 1.0 with overall confidence 0.475; status moved from active to candidate.
selected_option: Demote now (reduces false certainty, destabilizes current roadmap references)

rationale: After demotion to candidate, evidence remains directionally split (supports=2, weakens=2); approve hold-and-resolve before any promotion review.
selected_option: Keep candidate and run conflict-resolution experiments (most balanced)
